title: # 390 - Taylor Tomlinson & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Taylor Tomlinson to talk about her new Netflix special, bad strippers, OCD, Dad bods, new relationships, and much more!

Taylors Brand new special "Quarter Life Crisis" is streaming now on Netflix! Go watch it! 

This episode is brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop.Get 15% off your membership at www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com
